featured.text: Researchers found that commercial popcorn companies often coat their microwave popcorn bags with a 33 called perfluorooctanoic acid (PFOA) which has been found to cause both cancer and lung disease in laboratory animals.
Research by the U.S. government now reports that microwave popcorn may contain substances that can cause health 32 .

definition.en_def: A microwave is an appliance used for heating food by using microwave radiation.
